about_the_game: This specially remixed and edited soundtrack contains 9 atmospheric tracks to listen to or use for your roleplaying session. Created by the renowned composer team, Yannick Süß and Robin Birner integrating authentic Scandinavian and medieval instruments, these tracks put you right into the world of Aventuria.
detailed_description: This specially remixed and edited soundtrack contains 9 atmospheric tracks to listen to or use for your roleplaying session. Created by the renowned composer team, Yannick Süß and Robin Birner integrating authentic Scandinavian and medieval instruments, these tracks put you right into the world of Aventuria.
